name: Shadowstep
short_description: A 3D assassin game created for a Project at the Hogeschool van Amsterdam. 6 students that study Game Development are developing a game about a boy who joins the Shadowstep guild in order to cleanse the world from corruption within the medieval politics. You are to kill corrupted High Nobles and Kings that steal money from the people for their own good. Find your way into their hideout (castles and such) without creating commotion to assassinate your target. If you are seen by the guards, they will try and raise the alarm. As soon as alarm has been sound, the mission will restart. It is your job to find your way in, by setting booby traps and create distractions to get in.
summary: A school project for 6 students to create an Entertainment Game
